value.title: The Best Zerg vs Zerg Ever?! - Starcraft 2: Serral vs Rogue - WCS
value.excerpt: An amazing 30 minute action packed zerg vs zerg between Serral and Rogue. During the Starcraft 2 WCS Global Finals.
